input_email_body:
Subject: Request for software development consultation and server admin advice

Dear Customer Support,

I hope this message finds you well. My name is <name>, and I am reaching out regarding recurring system instability issues we have been experiencing My name is Jane Smith.. We are currently subscribed to your IT Consulting Service, and I believe we require a software development consultation and server administration advice to address these problems effectively. Could you please guide us on how to proceed with scheduling a consultation at your earliest convenience? You can reach me via email or contact me at <tel_num>. Your prompt assistance is greatly appreciated, as these issues are affecting our business operations.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,

<name> You can reach me at johndoe@email.com.
